text: @marcorubio “Trump used the spotlight of the 4th of July weekend to sow division during a national crisis, denying his failings in containing the worsening coronavirus pandemic while delivering a harsh diatribe against what he branded the “new far-left fascism.”https://t.co/H0DN8rDfZW
